# Rules

The Rules definition for GAP Lint

## Schema

The schema contains the structure to setup the Rules for GAP Lint.

* [Schema](https://github.com/mcmartins/gap-lint/blob/master/rules/rules-schema.json)

* [Online Rules Editor](http://jeremydorn.com/json-editor/?&&theme=foundation6&iconlib=fontawesome4&object_layout=normal&show_errors=interaction&disable_edit_json&disable_properties&disable_array_add&disable_array_reorder)

## How it works

GAPLint works by going through the code following a set of rules to analise and detect errors in gap language code.
These rules are defined in json and imported asynchronously when the module is loaded in the page. This allows
anyone changing the rules without having to change any code.
